name: Voxelstein UE
description:
This is a game made in only 2 days, trying to replicate the older style fps games, such as wolfenstein 3D or DOOM. I wanted to challenge myself to make a game in a few days, and actually complete said game. This is my first released game, however I am not really new to UE4, or blueprints. I just get way too ahead of myself when making video games. 

Anywho, its a simple FPS game, get to the end, fight the boss, and win!

Constructive criticism is definitely welcome. As I said, I just wanted to challenge myself to make a small game, and release it. I made the engine incredibly simple to modify, so I might just give away the project file so anyone can modify it if they like.
